required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of Clinical Outcomes After the Use of SYSTANE® HYDRATION
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of Clinical Outcomes Following the Use of SYSTANE® HYDRATION in Subjects With Dry Eye

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to compare SYSTANE® HYDRATION to Hyabak 0.15% based on total ocular surface staining scores (TOSS) at Day 42.

detailed_description.textblock: Subjects will first be dispensed preservative-free 0.9% saline eye drops (saline eye drops) to be used during the Run-in phase between Screening Visit and Day 0 (Visit 1). Subjects who qualify will be randomized in a 1:1 manner to receive either treatment with SYSTANE® HYDRATION Lubricant Eye Drops or Hyabak 0.15% Eye Drops.

primary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Total Ocular Surface Staining (TOSS) Score at Day 42
primary_outcome.description: The TOSS score is a cumulative cornea and conjunctival staining score. After instilling ophthalmic dye in the eye, the investigator grades 3 areas of the ocular surface for dryness on a scale from 0 to 5, where 0=Absent and 5=Severe. The 3 scores are summed for a resultant overall 0-15 score.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in IDEEL Treatment Satisfaction Scores (effectiveness and inconvenience) at Day 42
secondary_outcome.description: The IDEEL (Impact of dry eye on everyday life) is 10-question patient-reported outcome questionnaire that assesses the subject's general satisfaction with treatment use. A resultant overall 0-100 treatment satisfaction score is calculated, with higher scores indicating greater satisfaction and less treatment-related bother.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Tear Film Break-up Time (TFBUT) at Day 42
secondary_outcome.description: TFBUT is defined as the time elapsed between eye opening after a blink and the appearance of the first break in the tear film, ie, dry area. A longer tear film break-up time indicates a more stable tear film and may lead to improvement in dry eye symptoms.

arm_group.description: SYSTANE HYDRATION lubricant eye drops, 1 drop 4 times per day (QID) in each eye for 42 days
Hyabak 0.15% eye drops, 1 drop 4 times per day (QID) in each eye for 42 days

intervention.description: Preservative-free, one drop 4 times a day in each eye (run-in period)

facility.name: Contact Alcon Call Center for Trial Locations
